name: Death of Louise of the Netherlands
obverse: Bust of  Queen Louise, wearing a pearl necklace and jewels, facing left.
obverse_inscriptions: LOVISA DROTTNING AF SVERIGE OCH NORGE.
reverse: Winged angel facing right holding a fern and ouroboros.
reverse_inscriptions: FÖLJD AF KÄRLEK TACKSAMHET OCH SAKNAD
description: Louise of the Netherlands (5 August 1828 – 30 March 1871) was the Queen of Sweden and Norway as spouse of King Charles XV of Sweden and IV of Norway.
